channel.title: How do i make my own client?
channel.description: ok so i have a source and all that i want 2 make a client for my server how would i go about doing so 2 where they have 2 download and everything???

item.title: How do i make my own client?
item.dc:creator: @Stricken1337 Stricken1337
item.description:
@Stricken1337 wrote:

Download somebody else’s client, and edit it a little. If you decide to release it, edit a ton of stuff, like add lunar spellbook and stuff like that. Cause if you don’t, you will be accused of leeching.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my own client?
